live_updates: Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
59987.summary: Some customers in the Ruskin & Whonnock areas of Maple Ridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59987.title: Apr 11 - Maple Ridge (Ruskin & Whonnock) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
